Search 
Main Success Scenario:
  1. "GUI Search"
  2. End
Alternatives:
  1a. Search with Reltio API
    1a1. "API Search"
    1a2. go to step 2
    

GUI Search
Note:
  -guidance @
    -https://docs.reltio.com/en/explore/get-your-bearings-in-reltio/hub/search/working-with-the-main-search-page
Pre-Condition:
  -Not all attributes allow the same filter options
  -Operational values for an attribute are defined by the Survivorship Rules for the attribute
    -ref @ https://docs.reltio.com/en/explore/get-your-bearings-in-reltio/hub/search/search-by-operational-value-only
  -Only searching by OV value can ONLY be done at the top level of the search and not per attribute
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Choose entity to search in
  2. Search on all values in an attribute (searches all crosswalks making up a profile)
  3. 
  x. profiles returned in search results
Alternatives:
  2a. Search on ONLY operational values in an attribute
    2a1. limit to searching only by OV values
    2a2. go to step 3


API Search
Main Success Scenario:
  1. xxx:fill in
